game
Class Agent

java.lang.Object
  game.Entity
      game.Agent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Visualisable
Direct Known Subclasses:
UserAgent
public class Agent
extends Entity

An Agent acted upon by both the World model and the GA.

Author:
Matt Oates

calcFitness

public double calcFitness()
Used at the end of a GA epoch to calculate the fitness of an agents phenotype, minimum fitness possible is 1.

Returns:
The fitness value.

addChromosome

public Chromosome addChromosome(Chromosome chromosome)
Copy and add a given Chromosome to this agent. Used by symbiosis operators to introduce additional chromosomes.

Parameters:
chromosome - The chromosome object to clone and add.

addSymbiont

public void addSymbiont(Agent agent)
Deprecated. This method was replaced by addChromosome which encapsulates the call to clone and returns a handle to the chromosome copy. Symbiosis was directly performed with Chromosomes instead of Agents.

Add a symbiotic chromosome to the agent.

Parameters:
agent - The agent to add as a symbiont.
